markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Resolute](/Feats.aspx?ID=3748) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 49

**Archetype** [Thaumaturge](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=186)

**Prerequisites**
[Thaumaturge Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3743); expert in Will

</column>

---

You've tempered your mind and become resolute against effects that strain your willpower. Your proficiency rank for Will saves increases to master.
name: Resolute
